success.body: We’ll email you soon with a link for 15% off* your first online order. Please check your junk mail to make sure you don’t miss it.
success.title: Check your email for the discount link!

fields.modalDisclaimer: By signing up for email marketing, you agree to our Terms of Use and acknowledge our Privacy Policy. Unsubscribe at any time.

content.value: Your first online order of full-priced items when you sign up for emails and text messages.

fields.modalBodyNotes: Exclusions include: Accessories, Gift Cards, and We Made Too Much.

content.value: By providing your phone number, you consent to receive automated promotional marketing messages from lululemon at the number provided and acknowledge lululemon’s
Terms of Use
and
Privacy Policy
. Consent is not a condition of any purchase. Reply STOP to opt out of messaging. HELP for help. Msg frequency will vary. Msg and Data rates may apply.

fields.modalFooterSms: Discount valid only in the U.S., online at lululemon, for 14 days. Discount valid on one purchase of up to 15 full-priced lululemon items and cannot be combined with any other discounts or offers.

smsSuccessMessages.body: New subscribers will receive an exclusive 15% off link via text message and email.*
smsSuccessMessages.disclaimer: *Guests who have already subscribed to SMS will not receive the offer via text message.

content.value: By entering your email, you consent to receiving our marketing emails and acknowledge the

. You’ll be the first to know about new gear and more. You can unsubscribe at any time. See

colorAttributes.wwmt: These classic-fit trousers deliver all-day comfort with an elevated look.

attributes.text: Feels smooth, falls softly away from body
100% of the polyester in this product is recycled (excluding trims)
Streamlined fit that gives glutes and thighs breathing room
Our ABC™ (Anti-Ball-Crushing) technology uses an ergonomic gusset to remove tension from the crotch of our pants so you can move in comfort
Discreet zippered pocket on side seam
Back welt pockets with hidden snaps
Flip up the cuffs to reveal reflective details

fields.name: NA_Mar25_Wk3_M_MensCasual_PDP_VisualStoryGridHero_D_ABCTrouser_1322x744.jpg
fields.description: A person leans against concrete with a city landscape in the background.

fields.text: From work day to weekend, these trousers never look out of place.

content.value: Ergonomic ABC™ gusset unlocks your full range of motion.

content.value: Four-way stretch fabric retains its shape and doesn't bag out.

content.value: Wrinkle-resistance means these trousers always look fresh.

content.value: Slanted hand pockets are angled for a smooth front profile.

reviewsEntries.title: Great fit and feel
reviewsEntries.reviewText: Great fit and feel. Awesome for travel or the office

reviewsEntries.title: Tall Man Pants
reviewsEntries.reviewText: Great fit and fabric. Purchased for 37-inch long inseam as I am 6-4. They fit perfect 👌

reviewsEntries.title: Love them
reviewsEntries.reviewText: Fit as expected. Wish zipper was a bit longer.

reviewsEntries.title: Perfect for Wheelchair life
reviewsEntries.reviewText: The perfect pant for an active wheelchair user! Comfortable with good stretch and long enough to look great when living a seated life.

luluResponse.responseText: Happy to hear that the ABC Classic-Fit Trouser 37L's 4-way stretch is a sleek feature that's empowering an at ease feeling day to day.

reviewsEntries.title: Great pants
reviewsEntries.reviewText: I am 6’5” and about 210 lbs. I got 37” inseam which is comfortably long enough. Fit is good and they are comfortable. Not the first pairs I’ve purchased.

reviewsEntries.title: most comfortable "dress" pants
reviewsEntries.reviewText: Great fit. They look dressy when included in a dressy outfit but are secretly very comfortable.

luluResponse.responseText: Elevated comfort taken to the next level with the ABC Classic-Fit Trouser 37L Warpstreme.

reviewsEntries.title: Great fit for the golf course or the office
reviewsEntries.reviewText: Great fit for the golf course or the office

luluResponse.responseText: Versatility at it's finest. On and off the course.

reviewsEntries.title: I’m 6’6” – the 37" Inseam Fits Perfectly
reviewsEntries.reviewText: I’m 6’6” tall and the 37" inseam suits me well. This is my third pair of these pants. For my usage, each one lasts about a year. Great fit, I go everywhere with it, good quality.

reviewsEntries.title: Great for tall athletic builds
reviewsEntries.reviewText: Material is breathable and flexible and feels very comforts. Fits very well on an athletic build

reviewsEntries.title: The 37 length is tall guy certified

luluResponse.responseText: The ABC Classic-Fit Trouser 37L Warpstreme has a 4-way stretch that catches our imagination as we float through our day-to-day activities.

reviewsEntries.title: Good fit
reviewsEntries.reviewText: Well fitting trousers that look professional

reviewsEntries.title: Tall person
reviewsEntries.reviewText: Bought these pants online. I am tall and have difficulty finding long pants. These are great, comfortable and have an amazing fit.

reviewsEntries.title: Great fit and functionality
reviewsEntries.reviewText: Great fit and functionality…I had a meeting that required airport travel to get to. I have never owned any items from Lululemon before and these are my first.  These pants lasted the endurance test and looked just as good getting there as when I put them on before leaving the house! Comfortable to travel in as well and functional for moving fast between a tight connection. I highly recommend these and will be ordering more.

luluResponse.responseText: Thanks for taking the time to share your review for the ABC Classic-Fit Trouser 37L Warpstreme. The perfect pant for on-the-go days that offers versatile comfort and performance all in one.

reviewsEntries.title: Great fit!
reviewsEntries.reviewText: The tall fits my 6'8" husband. He loves them, very comfortable but nice enough to wear to work.

reviewsEntries.title: Comfortable pants
reviewsEntries.reviewText: Great pants for work, very comfortable!

colorAttributes.wwmt: These classic-fit trousers deliver all-day comfort with an elevated look.

attributes.text: Feels smooth, falls softly away from body
100% of the polyester in this product is recycled (excluding trims)
Streamlined fit that gives glutes and thighs breathing room
Our ABC™ (Anti-Ball-Crushing) technology uses an ergonomic gusset to remove tension from the crotch of our pants so you can move in comfort
Discreet zippered pocket on side seam
Back welt pockets with hidden snaps
Flip up the cuffs to reveal reflective details
